commitResults.messageBody:
Rename Duke.java to LeGoat.java.
Add LeGoat ASCII Art as logo.
LeGoat now echoes input from Scanner, quits when input is "bye".
Restructure LeGoat to handle inputs in inputHandler

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Mark, Unmark and Task class
commitResults.messageBody:
Logic for Mark and Unmark, including error handling implemented.
Task class now encapsulates the name of the task and its status.

- Changed handleInput() to switch format from if-else format.
- Restructured commands to respective methods in inputHandler.java
- Bugfix +1 issue for Mark, Unmark
